title: The EU and the Building up of its Neighbors: Effects on Regional Development of Reforms in �Employment and Social� and �Industrial and Enterprise� Policies in Turkey and Ukraine
abstractText: 'This research explores to what extent regional policies in Turkey and Ukraine secure an economic development of regions and better off local economic and social standards, increasing economic potential and decreasing motivation to migration. The research is carried out through a comparative analysis of what the EU has classified as �industrial and enterprise� and �employment and social� policies, and their effects, in selected regions of Turkey and Ukraine .'
